Key Match Events: The Tigers tied the game in the eighth inning with an RBI single and took the lead with a sac fly.
Casey Mize made his debut as a reliever, striking out four batters in two innings.
Reese Olson allowed two runs on four hits and zero walks with three strikeouts across four innings.
Milestones or significant achievements: Casey Mize's debut as a reliever after a career primarily as a starter.
Post-Match Reflections: The Tigers' win extended their winning streak to five games and bolstered their playoff chances.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rays scored three runs in the fifth inning, but the Tigers responded with three consecutive hits in the sixth inning.
The Tigers had a 30-11 record in their past 41 games.
